## Analysis script for "

```{r load libraries}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)

library(rstatix)
library(stats)
library(lme4)
library(dplyr)
library(ez)

```


## Extract dataframe from csv file and get (mean, sd) or (mean, se) summary

```{r read csv}

setwd("C:/Users/micha/OneDrive/My_GitHub_Repos/robot-x-ar/study2/data/")
task_df <- read_csv("merged_all_data.csv")


######################### get mean and sd (or se) ######################### 
task_df %>%
  group_by(condition) %>%
  get_summary_stats(time, type = "mean_sd")


```

## Plots

```{r do plotting}

bxp <- ggboxplot(task_df, x = "condition", y = "time", add = "jitter")
bxp

bxp <- ggboxplot(task_df, x = "cond_order", y = "time", add = "jitter", color = "condition")
bxp
# ggexport(bxp, filename = "tlx.png")


```


## Check assumptions

```{r check assumptions}

######################### check for outliers ######################### 
task_df %>%
  group_by(condition) %>%
  identify_outliers(time)

######################### check normality ######################### 
task_df %>%
  group_by(condition) %>%
  shapiro_test(time)
ggqqplot(task_df, "time", facet.by = "condition")


```


## Fit Model

```{r fit model}

######################### One-way ANOVA test #########################  
res.aov <- anova_test(data = task_df, dv = time, wid = pid, within = condition)
get_anova_table(res.aov)

# ######################### Two-way mixed ANOVA test #########################  
# res.aov <- task_df %>% anova_test(time ~ condition * cond_order)
# res.aov

# Two-way mixed ANOVA test
res.aov <- anova_test(
  data = task_df, dv = time, wid = pid,
  between = cond_order, within = condition
  )
get_anova_table(res.aov)

# pairwise comparisons
pwc <- task_df %>%
  pairwise_t_test(
    time ~ condition, paired = TRUE,
    p.adjust.method = "holm"
    )
pwc

# pairwise comparisons
pwc <- task_df %>%
  group_by(cond_order) %>%
  pairwise_t_test(
    time ~ condition, paired = TRUE,
    p.adjust.method = "holm"
    )
pwc
```
